programme.title: Provocative
programme.desc: Former socialite and much-reviled Tess, is released from 10 years of imprisonment for attempting to murder her wealthy husband by poisoning, shes now back to atone for the past, retrieve her children and find out the truth of who framed her.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Best Telenovela - National Winner Asian Academy Creative Awards (2020) | Kin is a drama about the complexities of life, love and family relationships. Years have passed since Yoke and Ella had their lives turned upside-down when they returned to be with their rightful families after having been swapped at birth. Years later, Yoke has seemingly embraced her role as a status-conscious, high society Shelley, assuming a leadership role in the family business. Ella has accepted her fate as a member of the salt of the earth, working-class Loh family but struggles to make something of her life. Has the nature vs nurture battle run its course or are relationships between the families still as fraught and complicated as ever? The Lohs, Shelleys, Hassans, and Balas have overcome personal loss, incarceration, as well as estrangement of their loved ones; yet lingering tensions remain. Mysteries continue to unfold as characters pursue their individual agendas, while emotional drama abounds as surprising twists are revealed that threaten the stability to which they have become accustomed..

programme.title: Black Thursday
programme.desc: On 2 Dec 1985, the Singapore Stock Exchange shut for three days. Overnight, the shares of Pan-Electric Industries were reduced to nothing, leading to the downfall of many brokerage firms and investors. But weeks before, alarm bells were already ringing for financial journalist, Conrad Raj. As news of Pan-Els burgeoning debt come to light, Glenn Knight and the newly established Commercial Affairs Investigation Department (CAID) are tasked to investigate.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating and claimed the lives of millions. In recent years, these extreme weather events have become more and more commonplace. Using incredible archive and astonishing user-generated footage of some of the most extraordinary weather the planet has ever seen, well relive these weather spectacles in astonishing minute by minute detail, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event on camera.

programme.title: Taste of Life
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers invention dream, the Chao brothers lives are about to change. 甘味人生，是一出阐述「一家人世代传承家业」的励志写实戏剧。剧中赵家是制作传统手工酱油的一个大家庭，家庭的父母兄弟姊妹，共同为这个家努力打拼的历程为主轴，描写刻画每个人在打拼的过程当中，与纠结在矛盾的感情世界里，所经历的悲欢喜乐。

programme.title: Dead Ringer
programme.desc: Wei Xiao Chen, a police who leads a SWAT team and breaks up the base of a human trafficking syndicate, and discovers the body of a woman who turns out to be her twin sister, Liang Xi. Xiao Chen is devastated and vows to spend the rest of her life tracking down the truth behind her sisters murder. 该剧讲述了华裔女队长魏晓晨带领特警队，捣破人口贩卖集团基地，发现一具女性尸体，竟然是孪生妹妹梁曦，晓晨悲痛欲绝，发誓要用余生追查妹妹被杀真相的故事。

programme.title: Golden City
programme.desc: This drama is set in the Jiufen area from the 1960s to the 1970s. It tells the story of how three brothers conquered the world with their bare hands. Through the love story of the previous generation, it connects the common emotions between the two generations depicting the memories and in-depth exploration of the differences in values between them. 本剧以1960年代至1970年代的九份地区为背景，述说三个拜把兄弟如何赤手空拳打天下，藉由上一代的爱情故事串连与第二代之间共同的情感与记忆，深度探索两代之间的价值观差异。

programme.title: James Going Places V
programme.desc: "James Going Places" focuses on finding the menu of James private kitchen. In order to find delicious dishes that he remembers, James will bring viewers to explore every corners that has tasty delicacies and culinary expertise. In the program, we will show the processing methods of special ingredients, try new sauces or new cooking methods, make creative dishes (cooking teaching), and finally a "James creative cuisine".

programme.title: The Cellphone Swap
programme.desc: Keeley Koh’s life runs on her phone—until a swap with a water polo star wrecks her perfect plans. Deadlines slip, feelings stir, and shirtless distractions pop up at the worst times. Can she reboot her dream—or is her heart downloading something new? 柯启莉的生活全靠手机——直到与水球队明星换机，计划全乱。截止日期失控、心跳失序，还有突如其来的‘腹肌通知’……她能重启人生程序，还是心已升级到全新版本？

programme.title: (Live) News Tonight
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news.

programme.title: Kampung Foodsteps
programme.desc: In a new season, host Darren Chng makes a nostalgic culinary homecoming with guests including Mei Sim and Yan Yan. Join them as they rediscover flavours in Pekan Nanas, Melaka, Kangar and beyond.

programme.title: The Legend of Heroes - Hot Blooded
programme.desc: The foolish young lad, Guo Jing, ultimately matures into a national hero who stands for the country and the people, embodying the true essence of chivalry.

programme.title: Destined
programme.desc: Liu Yu Ru is the only legitimate daughter of a former cloth merchant living a stoic life with her mother in a household where theyre mistreated despite their status. Due to a misunderstanding, she is married off to Gu Jiu Si, the notorious son of Yangzhous wealthiest family, infamous for his idle lifestyle and indolent ways. At first, Gu Jiu Si does not like Liu Yu Ru, believing her to be calculating and scheming.

programme.title: Secret Lives Of Trees
programme.desc: There are some seven million trees in Singapore and amongst them are a very special few that hold the answers to mysteries unlike any other. With a unique and unprecedented approach into our history, Secret Lives of Trees uncovers these secrets for the very first time. Why did hundreds of thousands of Angsana trees across the island mysteriously disappear in the 1980s? And how did an uninhabited mangrove island transform into a lush Casuarina forest on Coney Island? Told from the ground up through a cast of compelling characters, well dive into the backstories of these trees, uncovering clues from our history, cultures, communities and wildlife.

programme.title: Your Hand In Mine
programme.desc: Penny-pinching Zheng Shan Guo (Huang Wen Yong) and his family of 7 live in a 5-room apartment. His spend-thrift wife Yu Xiang (Chen Li Ping) manages to convince him to move into a bigger house, but ended up living next to a neurotic neighbour Wu You Li (Su Zhi Cheng). You Li has a large tumour growing around his neck, making him conscious and inferior. He does not get along with people and is often disagreeable. But the appearance of a blind girl changes him and he starts to warm up. Lan Jin Yin (Jin Yin Ji) stays in the apartment next to Shan Guo and raises her 2 grandchildren, Li Qin (Shaun Chen) and Li Fen (Cai Qi Hui), single-handedly after their mother Qiu Mei (Jue Xi) was imprisoned for killing their father. Qiu Mei was released from prison and was shunned by Jin Yin and Li Qin when she looks them up. She moved into an apartment near them in an attempt to reconcile and make up for her past mistakes. This is a heartwarming story that touches on family issues, regrets, love lost and found.

programme.title: Healing Heroes
programme.desc: Patients entrust their health and lives to doctors, but doctors are human too, how do they learn to shoulder the weight of these lives? Journey with four young aspiring junior doctors into our first medical longform drama, where they learn to grow with senior specialists, as they face life and death and overcome challenges on their way to become professional doctors... 病人将生命与健康交在医生手里，可是医生也是人，他们要如何学习承担这生命之重？跟随四名年轻小医生一起走进本地首部医疗长寿剧，看他们如何在资深专科医生的带领下成长，克服挑战，守护生命。

programme.desc: Do youngsters like traditional cuisine? Are the older generation resistant to trendy dishes? Do kids only eat fast food? To dispel these misconceptions, 3 hosts from different age groups will go on a nationwide culinary journey in a van, bringing them closer through food. An ingredient each episode, guiding viewers to explore a variety of traditional food, creative dishes, and kid-friendly treats!新一代年轻人不爱吃传统美食？老一辈年长者无法接受潮流料理？小孩只爱汉堡薯条？为了打破迷思，三位不同年龄层的主持人，将乘坐古董面包车，走访全国寻找美味料理，让美食打破年龄的隔阂，拉近彼此距离！每集将围绕一个主食材，带领大家探索各种不同的传统佳肴、创意料理和童趣美食，三道菜肴都各具特色，势必直击大家的味蕾！

programme.title: Your Hand In Mine
programme.desc: Penny-pinching Zheng Shan Guo (Huang Wen Yong) and his family of 7 live in a 5-room apartment. His spend-thrift wife Yu Xiang (Chen Li Ping) manages to convince him to move into a bigger house, but ended up living next to a neurotic neighbour Wu You Li (Su Zhi Cheng). You Li has a large tumour growing around his neck, making him conscious and inferior. He does not get along with people and is often disagreeable. But the appearance of a blind girl changes him and he starts to warm up. Lan Jin Yin (Jin Yin Ji) stays in the apartment next to Shan Guo and raises her 2 grandchildren, Li Qin (Shaun Chen) and Li Fen (Cai Qi Hui), single-handedly after their mother Qiu Mei (Jue Xi) was imprisoned for killing their father. Qiu Mei was released from prison and was shunned by Jin Yin and Li Qin when she looks them up. She moved into an apartment near them in an attempt to reconcile and make up for her past mistakes. This is a heartwarming story that touches on family issues, regrets, love lost and found.

programme.title: Golden City
programme.desc: This drama is set in the Jiufen area from the 1960s to the 1970s. It tells the story of how three brothers conquered the world with their bare hands. Through the love story of the previous generation, it connects the common emotions between the two generations depicting the memories and in-depth exploration of the differences in values between them. 本剧以1960年代至1970年代的九份地区为背景，述说三个拜把兄弟如何赤手空拳打天下，藉由上一代的爱情故事串连与第二代之间共同的情感与记忆，深度探索两代之间的价值观差异。

programme.title: Hear U Out
programme.sub-title: Desmond Ng and Ke Le Part 1
programme.desc: Catch Singapore’s most dramatic variety host Quan Yifong in this all-new real, raw and direct talk show where she has candid chats with her guests sharing timeless life stories and juicy gossips. Don’t forget to watch out for answers to questions posted by viewers on meWATCH Instagram stories! Celebrities include Tay Ping Hui, Kym Ng, Fann Wong, Jeanette Aw and Xiaxue. 权怡凤与嘉宾的深度聊天实录。汇集青春轨迹、时代故事、励志范本与八卦杂谈。既犀利又温馨的权式访谈风格，以知性、幽默的方式，为嘉宾熬出一碗碗心灵鸡汤。

programme.title: Healing Heroes
programme.desc: Patients entrust their health and lives to doctors, but doctors are human too, how do they learn to shoulder the weight of these lives? Journey with four young aspiring junior doctors into our first medical longform drama, where they learn to grow with senior specialists, as they face life and death and overcome challenges on their way to become professional doctors... 病人将生命与健康交在医生手里，可是医生也是人，他们要如何学习承担这生命之重？跟随四名年轻小医生一起走进本地首部医疗长寿剧，看他们如何在资深专科医生的带领下成长，克服挑战，守护生命。

programme.title: The Chaotic Era
programme.desc: During the Qing Dynasty, Miao Xian betrothed his daughter Cuihua and had a son Fang Shiyu. Shiyu grew up with his mother and is good at martial arts. When he was seven years old, he went to Hangzhou with his parents to study. At the age of fourteen, Chen Yushu, the owner of the Guangdong Guild Hall, held a township sports meeting in the Flower World of Hangzhou City. 大清年间，苗显将女翠花许配方德，育有儿子方世玉。世玉从小随母练得铜皮铁骨、一身好武艺，七岁随父母往杭州读书。十四岁那年，杭州城花花世界，广东会馆馆主陈玉书，举办一场乡民运动大会，将洋人的运动比赛引入，世玉见当地恶霸雷洪的众弟子仗势欺人，于是，便与兄弟小子与陈馆主之女可云，三人组成一队，与雷门弟子操场比赛，世玉轻功了得，赢得最终胜利，却因此与雷门弟子起了冲突，被巡捕拿到官府。

programme.title: Lets Talk About Health
programme.desc: Lets Talk About Health is a talk show that advocates healthy lifestyle! Doctors, TCM physicians, nutritionist and physiotherapist will share their knowledge and addressing on common myth. Mark Lee, Lee Teng and Jeremy Chan will take turn to host to present useful medical knowledge in a fun way!《医聊大小事》是一档倡导健康生活、关注大众身心的全新保健谈话类节目。医生、中医师、营养师、物理治疗师等将贴心解答一切健康大小事。妙语如珠的主持人李国煌、李腾以及Jeremy田铭耀，也将轮番上阵将医疗资讯通过轻松对话变得浅而易懂。希望聊着聊着，大家就了解了！别错过这一档可以一起长知识的节目哦！

programme.title: You Touched My Heart
programme.desc: Anyamanee meets Kueakhun, but their love life isnt easy. When the two families business problems get involved, including the death of Anyamanees brother, Kueakhun becomes her first suspect because of his past relationship with her sister-in-law, which ended a long time ago but has reared its head again. Will trust prevail in this situation? 剧情改编自皮雅彭的言情小说，主要讲述了两男两女之间错综复杂的四角关系

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride
programme.desc: A desperate revenge story of a woman who becomes the daughter-in-law of an enemy in search of her biological mother. 此剧讲述一个女人为了寻找亲生妈妈，而成为仇人儿媳的复仇故事。

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride
programme.desc: A desperate revenge story of a woman who becomes the daughter-in-law of an enemy in search of her biological mother. 此剧讲述一个女人为了寻找亲生妈妈，而成为仇人儿媳的复仇故事。

programme.title: The Glorious Pediatricians
programme.desc: The documentary captures the daily work of pediatricians and healthcare staff in major departments of Shenzhen Childrens Hospital, including emergency pediatrics, cardiothoracic surgery, intensive care, neurosurgery, urology, orthopedics, endocrinology, and hematology oncology. It focuses on the common interactions between ordinary people and hospitals, using the life and work of pediatricians as a microcosm. The story revolves around various pediatric departments, addressing parenting hot topics such as newborn care, learning difficulties, single parenting, and psychological issues. It reflects the different aspects of social life, leading the audience to appreciate the complexities of life. Through this approach, it aims to establish a vibrant image of pediatricians and build a warm, harmonious, and mutually supportive doctor-patient relationship. 记录了深圳市儿童医院急诊内外科、胸心外科、重症监护、神经外科、泌尿外科、骨科、内分泌科、血液肿瘤科等主要科室，儿科医生和医护人员日常工作状态，聚焦普通人与医院最常发生交集的场景，以儿科医生的工作生活为缩影，围绕不同儿科科室，讲述新生儿、学习困难、单亲带娃、心理问题等育儿热点，将故事辐射社会生活的各个层面，带领观众感悟人生百态，以点带面树立鲜活的儿科医生形象，构建温馨、和谐、互助共赢的医患关系。

programme.title: Good Partner
programme.desc: Good Partner is about two divorce lawyers, Cha Eun-kyung and Han Yu-ri, trying to choose the best option in the cruel balance game of life provides empathy and catharsis. 剧情讲述人气离婚律师车恩京陷入离婚危机，她与新人律师韩宥利经常因案件产生激烈冲突，一场律师间职场斗争即将上演。

programme.title: Taiwans 1001 Stories
programme.desc: This programme introduces to viewers Taiwans popular eateries, restaurants and its moving stories. 这个节目介绍台湾当地的美食与老板背后的动人故事。

programme.title: Lets Go Check In
programme.desc: This programme will unveil the mysterious world of the Middle East. Starting from the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan, which is ruled by the descendants of the Islamic Prophet Muhammad, and then going to the United Arab Emirates, which is the most highly developed in the world, passing through Qatar. Finally arrived at the back garden of Saudi Arabia - the Kingdom of Bahrain. 本节目以最神秘色彩的中东世界开始，一步揭开它的神秘面纱。从被伊斯兰先知后裔所统治的哈希姆王国开始，再前往全世界最高度发展，拥有最新最奢华阿拉伯联合大公国的生活，经过直到2021年才与中东各国家恢复重修的卡达关系，最后终于是沙乌地阿拉伯的后花园——巴林王国。

While overseeing renovations to her beach house in 1970s Chile, Carmen’s quiet life is upended when a priest asks her to hide a wounded fugitive. As she steps beyond her quiet life, Carmen is pulled into the undercurrents of a politically tumultuous Chile.

programme.desc: The mountain retreat of Zakopane, 1914. Joseph Conrad and three notorious artists wake up after a crazy party with a dead man on their couch and not a clue who he is, why is he dead, and why the gendarmerie are knocking on their doors.

programme.title: All My Friends Hate Me
programme.desc: Pete is cautiously excited about reuniting with his college crew for a birthday weekend. But, one by one, his friends slowly turn against him. Is he being punished, is he paranoid, or is he part of some sick joke?

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Fatal Alibi
programme.desc: A young motorcyclist is killed in an accident. Daniel Stokr, an employee of the Czech Ministry of Economy, is accused of being involved. Though Karla takes on the case, she is able to give him an alibi, which sends her on an uncertain trail for the truth.

programme.title: Karakol
programme.desc: After recently losing her father, Clara discovers a passport, foreign bills and letters while going through his things. Suspecting that he is living a secret life, she embarks on a trip to Karakil, a lake in Tajikistan, to find out the truth.

programme.title: Black As The Snow 2: Dead At The Summit

programme.title: On The Red Dot
programme.sub-title: Museum of U and Me (Ep 2): The Forgotten Pioneer Who Helped Build Singapore
programme.desc: Museum of U and Me is a heartwarming five-part factual series where entertainers Gurmit Singh and Oon Shu An hit the road in a van to uncover Singapores past through the everyday things people have held on to. Some of these keepsakes have already found their way into the National Collection, leading the hosts to the Heritage Conservation Centre to see how theyre carefully preserved. Others remain tucked away in storerooms and cupboards—objects that may look ordinary, but carry extraordinary tales. Each find comes with its own story—sometimes funny, sometimes moving, always personal. And in true roving-museum style, photos of these special items are taken and printed right there in the van, catalogued on the spot as living pieces of history. As the van fills up with stories and snapshots, so too does an ever-growing archive of memories— some of which will go on to inspire displays in a pop-up museum at the National Museum of Singapore.

programme.title: 3D Nation
programme.desc: If artificial intelligence is the head, then additive manufacturing or 3D printing makes its perfect hands. The exciting combination of the two is paving the way for applications that are already disrupting major industries and directly impacting our everyday lives. From foods for hospital patients to art that has traveled to the moon and back, and even life-saving medical innovations, the inconceivable is being built right before our very eyes. Each episode features a specific facet or sector in Singapore where we delve into the jaw-dropping revolution and debate over the implications at play. Part science exploration, part tech analysis and part social commentary, 3D NATION is a provocative watch for anyone with a stake in our future.

programme.title: ONE Friday Fights 126
programme.desc: This September, ONE Championship is bringing a massive blockbuster event to Asia primetime that fans around the globe can’t afford to miss! Some of the most popular strikers in the combat sports universe will descend upon the world-famous Lumpinee Stadium for ONE Friday Fights 126 on September 26, and the stakes in Bangkok that evening are sky-high. In the main event, reigning ONE Bantamweight Muay Thai World Champion Nabil Anane will jump-start his path to double gold. But his first bantamweight kickboxing match will be against the division’s #2-ranked contender and the former flyweight kickboxing king himself, Ilias Ennahachi. The event also marks the quick return of #3-ranked featherweight Muay Thai contender Shadow Singha Mawynn. He makes his promotional debut in kickboxing against Chinese phenom Liu Mengyang, the last person to beat ONE Interim Featherweight Kickboxing World Champion Masaaki Noiri.

programme.title: I Love You, Stupid
programme.desc: Iris Nur, a woman who manages her own life, is willing to sacrifice the people around her for her own sake. Because of that, a bodyguard, Firman, is hired to look after her throughout her existence on a humanitarian mission. However, the fact that Firman and everyone do not know is that Iris has other plans. But without realizing it, her life changed after she meets Firman.

programme.title: Rahsia Sepi Di Hati
programme.desc: This is a 2010 Mediacorp production.

programme.title: Aduh...Bibikku!
programme.desc: 4 close-knit maids are brought together by their jobs, life struggles and dreams. Friction between employer and helper brews from mismanaged expectation, clash of characters and misinformation on helper hire policies. Cracks emerge within Kepindo and Neng’s power as president is undermined. Join these 4 domestic helpers as they try to help each other get out of their misadventures in the name of sisterhood. 4 orang pembantu rumah saling berkongsi tugas, cabaran harian dan impian mereka. Pergeseran antara majikan dan pembantu tercetus dari perbezaan jangkaan, pertembungan personaliti dan kurangnya kepekaan terhadap polisi menggajikan pembantu rumah. Kepindo mulai berpecah belah dan presidennya, Neng, terasa tergugat. Saksikan bagaimana 4 pembantu rumah ini saling membantu tangani masalah yang mereka hadapi di atas nama persahabatan.

programme.title: Cinta Alesha
programme.desc: Tells the story about a girl named Alesha who does not get the love of a mother. After a few years, Alesha was taken to Jakarta with her grandmother, Masitoh.

programme.title: SKOOP!
programme.desc: Skoop! bersama Fiza O is a chat show that gets up close and personal with our favourite celebs. Host Fiza O unveils lesser known information about them while egging them on with other fun activities. Skoop! bersama Fiza O ialah sebuah rancangan bual bicara yang mengupas cerita-cerita tersorok berkenaan selebriti kegemaran kita. Hos Fiza O mengorek maklumat yang kurang diketahui tentang mereka sambil mengajak mereka beraktiviti menarik.

programme.title: Keranamu Khadijah
programme.desc: Khadijah is trapped between her modern desires and her familys strict values. Love that once felt pure is tested by betrayal and a secret that tears the family’s trust apart. As hearts waver between loyalty and self-interest, a slow burn of vengeance threatens to consume them all. TIme will tell if Khadijahs sacrifice will open the path to forgiveness and a family’s second chance. Khadijah terperangkap antara kebebasan dan nilai keluarganya yang tegas. Cinta diuji oleh pengkhianatan dan sebuah rahsia yang menghancurkan kepercayaan keluarganya. Hati berbolak-balik antara kesetiaan dan kepentingan diri. Rasa dendam mengancam untuk memusnahkan semuanya. Hanya masa akan menentukan jika pengorbanan Khadijah akan membuka jalan untuk kemaafan dan beri peluang kedua buat keluarganya.

programme.title: Cinta Tiada Ganti
programme.desc: The story follows a passionate romance filled with emotions and suspicions between Ara and Mukhriz who begin as enemies before falling in love. However, their love story is abruptly interrupted when a secret comes to light. The mistakes of their parents past and the long standing feud between their families compel them to rethink their relationship and alter the course of their hearts.

programme.title: Mechamato The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mechamato is a Malaysian animated series produced by Animonsta Studios, focusing on a boy named Amato and his partner robot MechaBot, who fight against bad robots. The animated series aired on Cartoon Network Asia from 4 December 2021 to 26 February 2022. Mechamato is a part of the BoBoiBoy franchise and the series also takes place before the original series and BoBoiBoy Galaxy.

programme.title: Sihat Oh Sihat
programme.desc: SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT is a new medical and health themed infotainment talk show program, formatted after Mediacorp Channel 8’s successful health talk show series, Body SOS. SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT is a one-stop health programme that encourages people to educate themselves and ask questions regarding various illnesses. This talk show is anchored by character playing hosts, Suzairhe Sumari and Haizad Imran who played as medical doctor refreshing and sharing their knowledge on various health conditions. SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT invites experts to explain the symptoms, causes and treatment of an illness, as well as a panel of celebrities to discuss myths and share their experiences of this illness. SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT merupakan sebuah rancangan talkshow kesihatan baharu berdasarkan pada rancangan kesihatan asal “Body SOS” yang diterbitkan oleh Saluran 8 Mediacorp. SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT merupakan sebuah hab kesihatan yang menggalakkan pendidikan masyarakat tentang kesihatan dan juga berbagai penyakit. SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT juga mengundang pakar untuk menerangkan simptom, punca dan rawatan bagi penyakit yang disembang bincangkan. Barisan panel selebriti juga akan bincang dongengan atau kepercayaan tentang sesuatu penyakit dan juga berkongsi pengalaman peribadi mereka.

programme.title: Dan Mimpi Pun Berguguran
programme.desc: The story of Icha and Saiful unfolds as they confront lifes difficulties when their marriage is shaken by a storm. Saiful is diagnosed with cancer and Ichas health starts to decline as a result of past events.

Kepindo mulai berpecah belah dan presidennya, Neng, terasa tergugat. Saksikan bagaimana 4 pembantu rumah ini saling membantu tangani masalah yang mereka hadapi di atas nama persahabatan.

programme.title: Cinta Alesha
programme.desc: Tells the story about a girl named Alesha who does not get the love of a mother. After a few years, Alesha was taken to Jakarta with her grandmother, Masitoh.

programme.title: Zoom Spain
programme.desc: The Zoom series is known as a riveting travel series where a dynamic duo of hosts begins an unforgettable adventure, delving into the history, culture, natural wonders, and culinary delights of a new country. From the bustling streets of ancient cities to the serene beauty of hidden landscapes, they uncover the stories and traditions that define each place.

programme.title: Keranamu Khadijah
programme.desc: Khadijah is trapped between her modern desires and her familys strict values. Love that once felt pure is tested by betrayal and a secret that tears the family’s trust apart. As hearts waver between loyalty and self-interest, a slow burn of vengeance threatens to consume them all. TIme will tell if Khadijahs sacrifice will open the path to forgiveness and a family’s second chance. Khadijah terperangkap antara kebebasan dan nilai keluarganya yang tegas. Cinta diuji oleh pengkhianatan dan sebuah rahsia yang menghancurkan kepercayaan keluarganya. Hati berbolak-balik antara kesetiaan dan kepentingan diri. Rasa dendam mengancam untuk memusnahkan semuanya. Hanya masa akan menentukan jika pengorbanan Khadijah akan membuka jalan untuk kemaafan dan beri peluang kedua buat keluarganya.

programme.title: Cinta Tiada Ganti
programme.desc: Riz wants to introduce Ara to Eliza but Eliza has to rush off to fly and join Raizal for business. Ara yearns to reconcile with her mother.

programme.title: Mechamato The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mechamato is a Malaysian animated series produced by Animonsta Studios, focusing on a boy named Amato and his partner robot MechaBot, who fight against bad robots. The animated series aired on Cartoon Network Asia from 4 December 2021 to 26 February 2022. Mechamato is a part of the BoBoiBoy franchise and the series also takes place before the original series and BoBoiBoy Galaxy.

programme.title: Sihat Oh Sihat
programme.desc: SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT is a new medical and health themed infotainment talk show program, formatted after Mediacorp Channel 8’s successful health talk show series, Body SOS. SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT is a one-stop health programme that encourages people to educate themselves and ask questions regarding various illnesses. This talk show is anchored by character playing hosts, Suzairhe Sumari and Haizad Imran who played as medical doctor refreshing and sharing their knowledge on various health conditions. SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT invites experts to explain the symptoms, causes and treatment of an illness, as well as a panel of celebrities to discuss myths and share their experiences of this illness. SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT merupakan sebuah rancangan talkshow kesihatan baharu berdasarkan pada rancangan kesihatan asal “Body SOS” yang diterbitkan oleh Saluran 8 Mediacorp. SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT merupakan sebuah hab kesihatan yang menggalakkan pendidikan masyarakat tentang kesihatan dan juga berbagai penyakit. SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT juga mengundang pakar untuk menerangkan simptom, punca dan rawatan bagi penyakit yang disembang bincangkan. Barisan panel selebriti juga akan bincang dongengan atau kepercayaan tentang sesuatu penyakit dan juga berkongsi pengalaman peribadi mereka.

programme.title: Dan Mimpi Pun Berguguran
programme.desc: The story of Icha and Saiful unfolds as they confront lifes difficulties when their marriage is shaken by a storm. Saiful is diagnosed with cancer and Ichas health starts to decline as a result of past events.

programme.title: Ini Baru Rare! Australia Barat

programme.title: Sampai 7 Keturunan
programme.desc: In a lucky draw contest, Aidil is selected to win a five-day, four-night stay in a five-star hotel and a cash prize of five thousand ringgit. However, due to his pregnant wife, Syikin, he decides not to take the vacation, but Aidil feels its a waste to let the prize go. He gives the cash and tickets to Pak Karim, who is reluctant to accept the offer, concerned about leaving his beloved chicken. After much persuasion, Pak Karim reluctantly accepts but is anxious about his chicken. As a virus outbreak in the hotel affects business, Shida stays at the hotel, unknowingly close to Pak Karim. Their encounters rekindle their relationship, and Shida proposes reuniting as a married couple, leaving Aidil and Syikin pleased.

programme.title: Misteri Minda
programme.desc: Misteri Minda is docu-drama series which deals with psychiatry and psychology. Each episode will deal with a particular mental condition or emotion. We will explore these conditions through re-enactment and commentary of experts.

programme.title: Azhagiya Tamil Magal

These experiences eventually shape the women into who they become by the end.
